textAfterTable: 10 Songs Biography Born: 08 September 1942 in San Francisco, CA Genre: Rock Years Active: '60s, '70s, '00s Sal Valentino was one of the great voices in American rock of the 1960s — as the lead singer of the Beau Brummels, he was for a time, in the mid-'60s, a fixture on AM radio, his voice associated with such hits as "Laugh Laugh" and "Just a Little," and he subsequently became a songwriter as well. Valentino, along with songwriter/guitarist Ron Elliott, was one of the co-founders of the band, and his friendship with Elliott went back more than a decade before the band was formed.
